Top List

Display a top amount raised list by Participants, Teams or Companies. Currently only pulls by Event (coming soon ability to filter by team or company). Must either set frId attribute, or can pass array in the listData attribute.

Examples

Top Teams by setting type and showBadges

<div top-list type="teams" show-badges="true" fr-id="1070"></div>

Top Companies by setting type and sizeLimit

<div top-list type="companies" size-limit="2" fr-id="1070"></div>

Generate list of top participants by passing an array from a Controller using listData

<div top-list list-data="topList"></div>
